#include <iostream>
#include <fstream>
#include <sstream>
#include <string>
using namespace std;

int main(int argc, char** argv) {

////////// DO NOT EDIT! //////////
  string path = argv[1];        //
//////////////////////////////////  

  ifstream file(path);
  if (!file.is_open()) {
      cerr << "Could not open file.\n";
      return 1;
  }

  string line;
  string oldest_name;
  int oldest_age = -1;

  while (getline(file, line)) {
      stringstream ss(line);
      string name, age_str, profession;

      // Read tab-delimited fields
      getline(ss, name, '\t');
      getline(ss, age_str, '\t');
      getline(ss, profession, '\t');

      int age = stoi(age_str);

      if (age > oldest_age) {
          oldest_age = age;
          oldest_name = name;
      }
  }

  file.close();

  cout << "The oldest person is " << oldest_name << "." << endl;

  return 0;
}
